i noticed that in all of the five sprots there is a higher percentage of colored players than colored coaches. This impacts my comunity alot because the graphs show that not alot of people of color are given the oppotunity to work in the sports field as coaches. 

4. What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.

This graph is showing the difference between the percentage of the colored players and the percentage of colored head coaches in the major league sports.  A catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea would be "Is there equality in professional sports?"

In the WNBA, 25 percent of the coaches are people of color.
